data.name: Introduction1
data.value: Our family hotel is located near a spring with miraculous water that never freezes or dries up. Legend has it that this water saved the local population from cholera in 1836, and even today people from all over the area come here to get the water. They say it helps them with skin, eye and digestive problems. And even those who don't believe it will confirm how delicious this water tastes.

data.name: Introduction2
data.value: No matter what time of year you visit, the beauty of the local nature will never disappoint you. It offers its colors, silence and relaxation. This picturesque valley is considered the most romantic valley of the Moravian-Silesian Beskydy Mountains. In the forest you will meet not only tourists, but also its original inhabitants, roe deer, deer, jays, squirrels... The meadows are full of blueberries, blackberries, mushrooms and rare trees and flowers, the increased occurrence of which you will notice especially in the nearby MIONÅ I primeval forest.
